Minecraft Dungeons Ultimate Edition

Experience the full story of Minecraft Dungeons from start to finish. Grab the Ultimate Edition with the base game and all six DLCs: The Jungle Awakens, Creeping Winter, Howling Peaks, Flames of the Nether, Hidden Depths, and Echoing Void. And the best part? The Ultimate Edition is cheaper than buying the game and DLCs separately.

Unlock special bonus digital content to become the ultimate hero! Download the Ultimate Edition today and get digital illustrations from each DLC and the full game soundtrack with over 200 songs. This offer is only available on Steam.

Minecraft Dungeons Ultimate DLC Bundle

Experience the story after the main game with the Minecraft Dungeons: Ultimate DLC Bundle. You’ve played the main story, but now it’s time for the ending! Fight against hordes of creatures, explore levels, jump into different dimensions, discover untold treasures and complete the story of the Orb of Domination. Grab the Ultimate DLC Bundle with all six DLCs: The Jungle Awakens, Creeping Winter, Howling Peaks, Flames of the Nether, Hidden Depths and Echoing Void. With this bundle, the six DLCs cost you less than if you bought them separately. Complete the story with the Ultimate DLC Bundle!

About this game

Battle your way through an exciting action-adventure game inspired by classic dungeon crawlers and set in the Minecraft universe! Venture into the dungeon alone or team up with friends! Up to four players can fight together through action-packed, treasure-filled and varied levels – all in one epic adventure to save the villagers and defeat the evil Arch-Illager!!

Gear up properly!

Unlock over 250 unique artifacts, gear, and enchantments to wield and survive devastating attacks.

multiplayer mode!

Up to four players can team up and fight together.

Options!

Customize your character, then smash your way through the hordes of creatures using melee, ranged, or heavily armored and shielded!

Simply epic!

Explore levels filled to the brim with treasure on your quest to bring down the evil Arch-Illager!
